sentence: In addition, Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney was removed from her House GOP leadership job and at least two others face Trump-backed primary challengers.
author: Associated Press
title: Sen. Thune of South Dakota, the No. 2 Republican, says he'll seek 4th term

sentence: In addition, Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney was removed from her House GOP leadership job and at least two others face Trump-backed primary challengers.
title: GOP Sen. John Thune of South Dakota says he'll seek a fourth term

sentence: In addition, Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney was removed from her House GOP leadership job and at least two others face Trump-backed primary challengers.

title: GOP Sen. John Thune of South Dakota says he'll seek 4th term

sentence: House Republican Conference Chairwoman Elise Stefanik (N.Y.) said Tuesday that the Republican National Committee (RNC) "has every right to take any action" to rebuke GOP Reps. Liz Cheney (Wyo.)
author: Cristina Marcos
title: Stefanik says RNC has 'every right' to censure Cheney and Kinzinger

sentence: And then I think on policy grounds, he is rightly seen as being a very solid conservative Republican very much in line with South Dakota voters.? Thune has avoided stepping on that image by not insisting on criticizing Trump in the same manner as someone like Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.).
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Thune on glide path to reelection a year after Trump's primary threats
